bmi_status.ui:title: BMI Status
ui:enumNames: BMI greater than or equal to 85th percentile (CPT G8417)

is_weight_management_referral_discussed.ui:title: Discussed referral to community resources for weight management

is_weight_management_referral_approved.ui:title: Approved referral to community resources for weight management

is_pcp_obesity_referral.ui:title: Patient referred to PCP for obesity evaluation and counseling

is_nutrition_exercise_discussed.ui:title: “5-2-1-Almost None” nutritional/exercise handout provided discussing nutrition and exercise recommendations

is_bmi_positive_counseling.ui:title: 2 or more minutes spent in face-to-face counseling discussing

is_weight_consequences_discussion.ui:title: Discussion: The health consequences of weight (diabetes, hypertension, heart disease)

do_begin_physical_activity.ui:title: Patient Goals: Begin physical activity routine

bmi_icd_10_code.ui:title: ICD 10 Codes
ui:enumNames: Z68.52 Body mass index pediatric, 5th percentile to <85% for age
Z68.53 Body mass index pediatric, 5th 85% percentile to less than 95th percentile for age
Z68.54 Body mass index pediatric, 5th percentile to >95% for age

tobacco_status.ui:title: Tobacco Products Status
ui:enumNames: Negative Screening for tobacco products (CPT G9903)
Positive Screening for tobacco products (CPT G9902)

is_tobacco_negative_counseling.ui:title: Spent at least 2 minutes in face-to-face counseling discussing health risks associated with the use of tobacco products (heart disease, lung disease, increased risk of cancer)

is_tobacco_positive_counseling.ui:title: Spent 2 or more minutes in face-to-face counseling discussing health risks associated with the use of tobacco products (heart disease, lung disease, increased risk of cancer)

is_pcp_tobacco_referral.ui:title: Patient referred to PCP for tobacco cessation counseling and further evaluation

is_tobacco_cessation_discussed.ui:title: Tobacco Cessation from with instructions for how to quit provided

is_phq_negative_parents_notified.ui:title: Parent notified of negative screening result

is_phq_intervention_pcp_referral.ui:title: Referral to PCP or appropriate mental health provider

is_phq_intervention_parent_notified.ui:title: Parent notified of score and plan of care

is_phq_intervention_school_notified.ui:title: Notified School Official to initiate mental health processes/protocol

is_encounter_for_other_screening.ui:title: ICD 10: Z13.89 Encounter for screening for other disorder

is_child_depression.ui:title: ICD 10:Z13.31 Adolescent or child depression (check only if Columbia was done)
